title: SOLD: T212 Erickson, SGC 20, Gilliam Squires Stamp
author: Beatles Guy

posts.post_title: SOLD: T212 Erickson, SGC 20, Gilliam Squires Stamp
posts.post_content:
Good evening.  I have for sale a presentable T212 Obak Erickson.  Very nice card, it just doesn't fit into my collection anymore. Looking for $35.00 dlvd, Paypal preferred.  Thanks for stopping by.

[IMG]http://i606.photobucket.com/albums/tt148/jalbregts/IMAG0332_zpsd8e52f00.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i606.photobucket.com/albums/tt148/jalbregts/IMAG0333_zpse5f53f4c.jpg[/IMG]

Make mention of the Gilliam Squires stamp in the title and you might get some bites. I know there are at least a couple of people looking for that stamp.

Joshua

[quote name="Wite3" post=1089778]Make mention of the Gilliam Squires stamp in the title and you might get some bites. I know there are at least a couple of people looking for that stamp.

Joshua[/QUOTE]

Thank you sir, appreciate the info.

[quote name="jimhopkins82" post=1089784]Hey, I'll take it.[/QUOTE]

Thank you sir, it's yours.  Sending a PM with my info.
